nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.access

Interface AccessService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AccessServiceLocal
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessServiceImpl, AccessServiceSecurity

    public interface AccessService
extends Service
    Service interface for login/logout and related operations, as well as managing credentials
    Author:
    luis

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Returns whether the logged user can change channels access to the given member

      • canChangeChannelsAccess

        boolean canChangeChannelsAccess(Member member)
        Returns whether the logged user can change channels access to the given member

      • changeChannelsAccess

                          java.util.Collection<Channel> channels,
                          boolean verifySmsChannel)
        Change the channels that the given member have access to

      • changePassword

        User changePassword(ChangeLoginPasswordDTO params)
                    throws InvalidCredentialsException,
                           BlockedCredentialsException,
                           CredentialsAlreadyUsedException
        Changes the password of the given user
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialsException
        BlockedCredentialsException
        CredentialsAlreadyUsedException

      • changePin

        MemberUser changePin(ChangePinDTO params)
                     throws InvalidCredentialsException,
                            BlockedCredentialsException,
                            CredentialsAlreadyUsedException
        Changes the pin of the given member user
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialsException - When the given pin is invalid
        BlockedCredentialsException - When the transaction password was invalid a few times, it becomes blocked
        CredentialsAlreadyUsedException - When the given new password was already used for that user in past

      • checkCredentials

        MemberUser checkCredentials(Channel channel,
                          MemberUser user,
                          java.lang.String credentials,
                          java.lang.String remoteAddress,
                          Member relatedMember)
                            throws InvalidCredentialsException,
                                   BlockedCredentialsException,
                                   InvalidCardException
        Checks for credentials for the given member, in the given channel
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialsException
        BlockedCredentialsException
        InvalidCardException

      • checkSession

        Session checkSession(java.lang.String sessionId)
                     throws NotConnectedException
        Loads a session by session id, ensuring it is valid
        Throws:
        NotConnectedException - When there is no such session

      • checkTransactionPassword

        User checkTransactionPassword(java.lang.String transactionPassword)
                              throws InvalidCredentialsException,
                                     BlockedCredentialsException
        Checks whether the given transaction password is valid or not for the logged user. When the number of wrong tries is greater that the element's group basicSettings.maxTransactionPasswordWrongTries, the transaction password must be blocked and a member alert must be generated
        Throws:
        InvalidCredentialsException - Wrong transaction password
        BlockedCredentialsException - The user has missed the password too many times

      • disconnect

        User disconnect(Session session)
                throws NotConnectedException
        Disconnects a logged user session
        Throws:
        NotConnectedException - When there's no such session

      • disconnect

        User disconnect(User user)
                throws NotConnectedException
        Disconnects all sessions of the given user
        Throws:
        NotConnectedException

      • generateTransactionPassword

        java.lang.String generateTransactionPassword()
                                             throws UnexpectedEntityException
        Generates a transaction password for the logged user
        Returns:
        The plain generated transaction password
        Throws:
        UnexpectedEntityException - When the logged user's group doesn't uses transaction password

      • getChannelsEnabledForMember

        java.util.Collection<Channel> getChannelsEnabledForMember(Member member)
        THIS METHOD MUST BE USED INSTEAD OF member.getChannels()
        Returns:
        the channels enabled for the specified member taking into account the group's channels.

      • getLoggedUser

        User getLoggedUser(java.lang.String sessionId)
                   throws NotConnectedException
        Returns the user logged in the given session
        Parameters:
        sessionId - Id of the session
        Returns:
        The user logged in
        Throws:
        NotConnectedException - No user logged under this session id

      • hasPasswordExpired

        boolean hasPasswordExpired()
        Check if the login password for the logged user has expired

        boolean isCardSecurityCodeBlocked(Card card)
        Returns whether the security code for the given card is blocked

        boolean isChannelEnabledForMember(Channel channel,
                                Member member)
        Check if the channel is enabled for the member

      • isChannelEnabledForMember

        boolean isChannelEnabledForMember(java.lang.String channelInternalName,
                                Member member)
        Check if the channel is enabled for the member

      • isLoggedIn

        boolean isLoggedIn(User user)
        Returns the session id for the given user if it is logged
        Parameters:
        user - The user
        Returns:
        The session id if the user logged in, null otherwise

      • isLoginBlocked

        boolean isLoginBlocked(User user)
        Checks if the given user's login is blocked. The user's login could be blocked because he missed several times the password or he got too many access denied exceptions.

      • isPinBlocked

        boolean isPinBlocked(MemberUser user)
        Checks whether the given member's pin is blocked for exceeding wrong tries

      • login

        User login(User user,
         java.lang.String password,
         java.lang.String channel,
         boolean isPosWeb,
         java.lang.String remoteAddress,
         java.lang.String sessionId)
           throws UserNotFoundException,
                  InvalidCredentialsException,
                  BlockedCredentialsException,
                  SessionAlreadyInUseException,
                  AlreadyConnectedException
        Logs the specified user in the system
        Parameters:
        user - The user to login
        password - The MD5 hashed password
        remoteAddress - The IP address for the requesting login
        sessionId - The session id for the user
        Returns:
        the user logged in
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - Invalid username
        InvalidCredentialsException - Invalid password
        BlockedCredentialsException - When the user is blocked by reaching the max login tries
        SessionAlreadyInUseException - The given session id is already in use
        AlreadyConnectedException - The user is already logged in, and the access settings prevents multiple connections

      • logout

        User logout(java.lang.String sessionId)
        Logs out of the system the user corresponding to the given
        session id and removes it from the logged users list
        Parameters:
        sessionId - Id of the session to be logged out

      • notifyPermissionDeniedException

        boolean notifyPermissionDeniedException()
        Notifies the system of a permission denied exception. The system keeps track of how many have arisen and blocks the user if it detects that there have been too many since the last login.
        Returns:
        true if the user's login has been blocked.

      • reenableLogin

        User reenableLogin(User user)
        Immediately re-enables an user to login after wrong password tries

      • resetPassword

        MemberUser resetPassword(MemberUser user)
        Reset an user's password, sending it by mail

      • resetTransactionPassword

        User resetTransactionPassword(ResetTransactionPasswordDTO dto)
        Resets the transaction password of the specified user

      • searchSessions

        java.util.List<Session> searchSessions(SessionQuery query)
        Searches for connected user sessions

      • unblockPin

        MemberUser unblockPin(MemberUser user)
        Unblocks the given member's pin

      • validateChangePassword

        void validateChangePassword(ChangeLoginPasswordDTO params)
                            throws ValidationException
        Validates the password change
        Throws:
        ValidationException

      • validateChangePin

        void validateChangePin(ChangePinDTO params)
                       throws ValidationException
        Validates the parameters of a pin change
        Throws:
        ValidationException

      • verifyLogin

        User verifyLogin(java.lang.String member,
               java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String remoteAddress)
                 throws UserNotFoundException,
                        InactiveMemberException,
                        PermissionDeniedException
        Checks if the login can be performed for the given username and address
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - When the given user does not exist
        InactiveMemberException - When the member has no active password
        PermissionDeniedException - When the member does not have permission to login
